summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The VMRPRESENTATIONINFO structure is used in the method (VMR-7 only).

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.dwFlags
member.summary: A bitwise combination of flags from the enumeration, which describe the status of the video sample with respect to its presentation time.

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.lpSurf
member.summary: Pointer to the DirectDraw surface that contains the video frame to be presented.

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.rtStart
member.summary: The start time for the current frame, in 100-nanosecond units.

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.rtEnd
member.summary: The end time for the current frame, in 100-nanosecond units.

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.szAspectRatio
member.summary: The aspect ratio of the rectangle.

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.dwTypeSpecificFlags
member.summary: Bitwise combination of flags, as defined for the structure.

member.name: VMRPRESENTATIONINFO.dwInterlaceFlags
member.summary: Bitwise combination of flags, as defined for the dwInterlaceFlags member of the VIDEOINFOHEADER2 structure.
